name: I See Your Pain
description:
In that adventure game about dying man you will see your pain, face your fears and find a reason to live on. Too little time to sit and wait. It’s time to pull the swords of betrayal, lies and disappointment out of your back and remove enemies from your way to the truth.

Features

  • Adventure game with open game world of four locations
  • Four swords in main character’s back that can be used against enemies + modifications
  • The ability to create your fight clones to expand battle force and solve little puzzles
  • A lot of enemies of different types – starting from usual mobs to big bosses
